title: Client won't open.
body: Theres seems to be an issue where the client won't open, not sure if this problem is happening with other users, please fix!

replies.body: If it doesnt open press CTRL+ALT+DEL, press TASK MANAGER, in task manager goto section PROCESSES, find LEAGUECLIENT.EXE, and press END THIS PROCESS. After that try reopen client. If u cant be stuffed restarting it thats the most convenient way to make it work

A little more descriptive? Was there an error message or something?

{{champion:17}}
